description: Provides certified digital copies of land ownership and property documents.
required_documents: Recent utility bill as address proof
application_process_steps: Step 1: Visit Punjab Land Records Authority (PLRA) office or online portal.
Step 2: Submit CNIC and property details.
Step 3: Collect certified digital land record extract.

description: Financial support for low-income families through zakat distribution.
required_documents: Recommendation letter from local mosque committee
application_process_steps: Step 1: Apply at local Union Council office.
Step 2: Submit required documents and poverty status verification.
Step 3: Receive Zakat assistance directly into your bank account.

description: Apply for new water supply connection in urban areas through Water and Sanitation Agency (WASA).
application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit application at WASA office with documents.
Step 2: Inspection by WASA engineer.
Step 3: Pay connection fee and installation of pipeline.

description: Discounted monthly bus passes for students and senior citizens.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Visit the local bus terminal concession counter.
Step 2: Submit ID and application form.
Step 3: Collect concession card for monthly travel.

description: Subscription-based ambulance service for emergency medical support.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Register at Rescue 1122 office or online portal.
Step 2: Pay nominal membership fee.
Step 3: Receive membership card for priority ambulance service.

description: Free vaccination services for children and adults under national immunization programs.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Visit nearest Basic Health Unit or vaccination center.
Step 2: Present documents for registration.
Step 3: Get vaccinated and receive updated vaccination card.

description: Subsidized fertilizers and seeds for small-scale farmers.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Apply at local Agriculture Department office.
Step 2: Submit CNIC and land record for verification.
Step 3: Collect vouchers for subsidized inputs.

description: Monthly pension for senior citizens without other means of income.
required_documents: Proof of no other pension/income source
application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit application at Social Welfare Department.
Step 2: Provide necessary documents for verification.
Step 3: Pension deposited monthly into applicant’s account.

description: Issuance of learner, permanent, and international driving licenses.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit learner license application at licensing center.
Step 2: Appear in driving test for permanent license.
Step 3: Collect license upon successful evaluation.

description: Official registration of marriages under local Union Councils.

eligibility_criteria.marital_status: Unmarried at the time of registration

application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit Nikah Nama at local Union Council office.
Step 2: Verification of documents and witness identities.
Step 3: Receive official Marriage Registration Certificate.

description: Emergency financial aid for families affected by floods, earthquakes, or other natural disasters.
required_documents: Proof of residence in affected area
application_process_steps: Step 1: Register at the relief camp or online NADRA portal.
Step 2: Submit CNIC and proof of residence.
Step 3: Receive grant amount via Ehsaas Cash program or mobile wallet.

description: Apply for a new electricity connection through WAPDA/LESCO.
required_documents: Property ownership deed or rental agreement
Site map with meter installation point
application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit application at the electricity distribution company office or online portal.
Step 2: Site inspection by engineer.
Step 3: Pay connection charges and receive new meter installation.

description: New Sui Northern or Southern Gas connection for households.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Apply online or at SNGPL/SSGC office.
Step 2: Submit property ownership and CNIC details.
Step 3: Pay connection fee and pipeline installation is scheduled.

description: Low-interest loans for small businesses and women entrepreneurs.
required_documents: Business plan or shop license (if available)
application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit loan application to microfinance bank.
Step 2: Provide guarantors and business plan.
Step 3: Loan disbursed upon approval into applicant’s bank account.

description: Free vocational training and stipends for women to learn income-generating skills.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Apply online or at local Women Development Department office.
Step 2: Attend orientation and submit documents.
Step 3: Begin training and receive monthly stipend.

description: Renew expired CNICs or upgrade to Smart National ID Card with chip.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Visit NADRA Registration Center.
Step 2: Submit biometric verification and required documents.
Step 3: Collect Smart CNIC after processing period.

description: Financial aid for university students on merit and need basis.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Apply through Higher Education Commission (HEC) portal.
Step 2: Submit required documents for verification.
Step 3: Scholarship awarded and fees adjusted in university account.

description: Official registration of newborns for issuance of Birth Certificate.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Visit local Union Council office with documents.
Step 2: Submit application form for child registration.
Step 3: Receive computerized Birth Certificate.

description: Registration of deaths for issuance of death certificates.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit application at local Union Council office.
Step 2: Provide required documents.
Step 3: Collect official death certificate.

description: Rechargeable smart card for daily commuters using metro bus services.

eligibility_criteria.residency: Urban area with metro bus service

application_process_steps: Step 1: Visit metro bus station ticket counter.
Step 2: Provide CNIC and photo for registration.
Step 3: Collect smart card and recharge for travel.

description: Free government-sponsored training in basic IT skills for youth and adults.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Register online or at a designated IT training center.
Step 2: Attend orientation and submit documents.
Step 3: Begin digital literacy course.

description: Online tracking of ongoing court cases for transparency and efficiency.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Visit the e-court portal and log in with CNIC.
Step 2: Enter case registration number.
Step 3: View real-time case updates and hearing schedules.

description: Provides official verification of character for employment, visas, or study abroad.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit application at local police station or online police services portal.
Step 2: Background verification by police department.
Step 3: Collect character certificate within specified timeline.

description: Approval for setting up industrial or commercial projects while ensuring environmental safety.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Submit permit application to Environmental Protection Agency (EPA).
Step 2: Attach all required documents including impact assessment.
Step 3: Receive clearance or compliance requirements before project initiation.

description: Facilitates registration of small and medium enterprises (SMEs) with government authorities.
application_process_steps: Step 1: Apply online or at SECP regional office.
Step 2: Provide CNIC and business documents for verification.
Step 3: Receive SME registration certificate.
